alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 2:28AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MCPHERSON...NORTHERN RICE...SOUTHERN ELLSWORTH AND SOUTHWESTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just northeast of Geneseo, or 11 miles southeast of Kanopolis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Lindsborg, Marquette, Little River, Chase, Geneseo, Lorraine, Windom, Falun, Frederick, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
